Reviews.Title: Good phone to have
Reviews.Author: andrew ngo
Reviews.Content: - Compact style, physical keyboard. Touch screen, but seem not useful!- Android 1.6, but can be upgraded to 2.1 update 1 with Sony Ericsson PC Companion software. Batter is drained fast, within a day, but don't complaint - it happen on all Android phone if you leave all "default" setting on (such as Bluetooth, wifi,..) and default "services" run underneath.- With iPhone4 line up in Verizon, Xperia price will drop more, and it really good chance to have a good phone at competitive price in smart phone class.

Reviews.Title: battery sucks
Reviews.Author: Telma Micheloto
Reviews.Content: The Sony Ericsson x10 mini pro is great if you are looking for a smartphone that's small and light and yet has a full qwerty keyboard. But the major problem is that the battery is ridiculously limited. It doens't even last a whole day. Be prepared to be stuck with a dead battery in the middle of a day out.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied, just watch out for one thing
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: The phone is the middle ground:It's an android phone and it has all the gimmicks (app market, connectivity, touchscreen, camera, gps, etc)It's not intended to be a media outlet like other phones (but it does averagely good in that sense)Don't expect this to be an iphone but don't expect it to be bad, it's just the middle ground.I'm a professional and I bought this because I needed to check my emails on the move. My previous phone is 4 years old so it was about time as well.Watch out for one thing: you can update the firmware to build version 1.1.A.0.8 through the software in your computer or over-the-air. This, however, is not the latest firmware.In some countries you'll be able to update it to a later version and in some others even up to Android 2.1 (just released in some European countries last week).What's the relevance of all this? That firmware upgrade fixes a flaw in the device: sometimes, depending on the sim cards being used, the phone will not turn on with a sim card inside if you happened to switch sim cards. Additionally, sometimes it will not turn on with a sim card inside if you let the battery discharge completely (which is necessary at the beginning at least, to optimize battery performance).I've worked with 3 sims and this has happened to me with 2 of them. The workaround is this: leave the sim card inside and plug the usb cable into the computer and to the phone, turn on the phone while pressing the back key. If this does not work then try to just connect the cable to the computer (not the phone) then hold the back key as you connect it to the phone. Release until it turns on.Finally, if nothing worked, select update/repair through the update software and it will flash the device to the "latest" version you're being allowed to download.What....you ask what SE said about all this? Nothing.

Reviews.Title: SO SLOW!
Reviews.Author: tara
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small phone instead of the monsters everyone has now.The size is good and seems well made and durable, but the phone kinda sucks.The quality of calls is good. I can hear people clearly and loudly enough.But...Even with just switching from screen to screen which has nothing to do with 4g or 3g, it takes so long! Or the screen freezes all together.The touch screen in general isn't the greatest.I just don't like it. I can't recommend it. I'll be getting a different new phone.Disappointing.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Slim Thick
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone.  It's small and I enjoy the features.  Only dropped it once and I've had it for a least a year. Gave it a 4 cause the touch screen is giving problems at the moment.

Reviews.Title: Funcional, Barato e de qualidade!
Reviews.Author: Leandro Preço
Reviews.Content: Celular Funcional, Barato e de qualidade! Funcional porque faz tudo que um laptop faz, com seu teclado fica muito fácil a digitação. O sistema android é show. Barato pois não canso de fazer comparações com o Brasil, no Brasil é o dobro do preço! E tem a qualidade indiscutível Sony Ericsson!! Pode comprar!

Reviews.Title: BUEN TELEFONO
Reviews.Author: Fran
Reviews.Content: BUEN TELEFONO, EL SISTEMA TOUCH ES UN POCO INCOMODO PERO ES CUESTION DE ACOSTUMBRARSE...., LA BATERYA NO TIENE MUCHA DURACION...:)

Reviews.Title: Black or White?
Reviews.Author: Art
Reviews.Content: On the order the phone was white in color but got a black one. So its ok, never mind. Fast delivery. Thanks
